## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e18cae6ce0c3de2fe7988c316471f5383433deaa0e8b9bf0376b69b634188218)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@the-c-company/common-utils' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
